Body.Subject: WE ARE OFFICIALLY 2 WEEKS AWAY!🤯💥
Body.Email_Contents: Can’t see images? Click here (https://mailchi.mp/c38ffab615ef/319cgadpza-18235699?e=bde13e028b) https://www.dearsummerfestival.com/?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID https://posh.vip/f/1fa82?t=dsny25mailchimpds060625&mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID ** Dear Summer Fam! ------------------------------------------------------------ We are officially 2 weeks away from the VIBESSSS 🎉☀️.  Hope you’re ready! Get your fits right, gather the crew, and have your energy ALL the way up!!! This one’s gonna be a show 😎🎶🍹 Let the countdown begin! Get Tickets (https://posh.vip/f/1fa82?t=dsny25mailchimpds060625&mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID) ** CONCERT ACCESS VVIP ALMOST SOLD OUT!! ------------------------------------------------------------ Concert Access VVIP! This exclusive ticket includes all the same perks as VIP, plus ON STAGE-side-access, putting you right next to the action! These tickets are extremely limited, so don’t wait- grab yours before they’re gone. *********************************************************** For those who want to UPGRADE from a ticket already purchased to the “ VIP ON STAGE ACCESS” all you have to do is the following: * PURCHASE THE VIP ON STAGE ACCESS TICKET * SEND US YOUR ORDER NUMBER FOR THE VIP ON STAGE ACCESS TICKET * SEND US YOUR NAME ONCE WE RECEIVE THE ABOVE WE WILL ISSUE YOU A REFUND **REFUNDS FOR UPGRADING WILL END JUNE 7TH 2025** ** THE OFFICIAL AFTER PARTY!! ------------------------------------------------------------ After the SHOW comes the AFTER PARTY💥 We’re taking the vibes to Amadeus, one of NYC’s hottest spots, for the OFFICIAL Dear Summer After Party! 🥳🔥 https://posh.vip/f/2d16d?t=amadeusdsny25060625dslist&mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID Afterparty Tickets (https://posh.vip/f/2d16d?t=amadeusdsny25060625dslist&mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID) ** PERFORMING LIVE! ------------------------------------------------------------ https://posh.vip/f/1fa82?t=dsny25mailchimpds060625&mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID https://posh.vip/f/1fa82?t=dsny25mailchimpds060625&mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID ** 🎉 THE VIBES ARRIVE IN…… ------------------------------------------------------------ Mark your calendars, gather your crew and get ready for a MOVIEE NEW YORK. https://www.dearsummerfestival.com/?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID ** GATHER THE CREW ------------------------------------------------------------ Lit crew, new friends, good drinks, and non-stop dancing all night. Let’s gooo! 🔊🎶✨ https://www.dearsummerfestival.com/?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID ** WE LOVE TITO’S ------------------------------------------------------------ https://youtu.be/7ZjS1e8M69M?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID https://www.dearsummerfestival.com/?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID https://www.facebook.com/DearSummerFestival/?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID https://www.instagram.com/dearsummerfestival/?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID https://www.dearsummerfestival.com/?mc_cid=d1bd5ab3eb&mc_eid=UNIQID mailto: Dear Summer Festival is more than just an event, it’s a destination!
